title: Fatal Fury 2: The New Battle (Dub)
alternative_title: バトルファイターズ餓狼伝説2
description: After defeating Geese Howard, legendary fighter Terry Bogard faces German warrior Wolfgang Krauser, only to suffer a humiliating defeat. Depressed by his loss, Terry wanders around the country, wasting his life through drinking. Only a young boy named Tony can convince Terry to go back to his winning ways, conquer his fears, and once again face Krauser.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Martial Arts>, <Genre -> Shounen>]
